name: Image highlight on hover.
description:
Make images that have a href attribute (image link) be highlighted in blue, on hover.  Not so good with small containers, as the shadow will be cut-off.

A similar style:  style 423

If you want to remove the dotted frame when clicked, use style 12612.
additional_info: 09/26/2009 - Edited to exclude images that have "banner", "logo" or "header" as part of their source/filename.
